original_text:
So he took him to the commander.
The centurion said, “Paul, the prisoner, sent for me and asked me to bring this young man to you because he has something to tell you.”
korean_text: 천부장에게로 데리고 가서 이르되 죄수 바울이 나를 불러 이 청년이 당신께 할 말이 있다 하여 데리고 가기를 청하더이다 하매

sentences.original_text: So he took him to the commander.
and asked me to bring this young man to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 청년을 당신에게 데려오라고 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: because he has something to tell you."
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 당신에게 말할 것이 있기 때문입니다."
